name: Get Into Kiting Games
description:
Want to play a game that's about flying a kite?  No? Well, now you can anyway!

I made this small project to test, practice, and to have something to work on while I figured out what I was going to do next.

It's not a lengthy game. It's just supposed to be a short, chill game without any stakes. Enjoy it for one minute, five minutes, or however long you want.

Then, you just shut it down and never think about it again.

(Using the likeness of Woolie from WoolieVersus on Twitch, with permission)

Gamepad recommended.
